Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Carlijn Isa Voorn at a corporate retreat in Amsterdam. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Carlijn Isa Voorn is a 40 year old and comes from Netherlands.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Carlijn Isa Voorn is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2004, Carlijn finished her secondary school education at Willem de Zwijger College Bussum.
After that, she went on to study at Maastricht University School of Business and Economics until 2008.
Additionally, she went on to study at Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences until 2013.
Occupation History:
Carlijn Isa Voorn is a 40 year old Developer from Netherlands.
At PGGM Real Estate, Carlijn Isa Voorn held the position of Property Manager from 2008 to 2012, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Developer at Bouwinvest REIM B.V. in 2013, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 250000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns townhouse in Roosendaal, where she resides. It is worth 1210000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, she received an inheritance of 840000 EUR in 2015, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Carlijn as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
